#summary Zend_Image provides basic functionality.

,,A :: B means, that object A has type B.,,

= Preparing for use =
{{{
require_once 'Zend/Image.php';
}}}

= Methods =
== Creating object ==
`__`construct( $input, $driver );
 # $input :: null | string | Zend_Image;
 # $driver :: Zend_Image_Driver.
=== New empty image ===
{{{
$image = Zend_Image( null, $driver );
}}}

=== Loading existing image by filename ===
{{{
$image = new Zend_Image( $filename, $driver );
}}}

=== Passing existing image object ===
{{{
$image = new Zend_Image( $image2, $driver );
}}}

where $image2 :: Zend_Image.

=== By binary contents (?) ===
{{{
$image = new Zend_Image( $binaryImage, $driver );
}}}


== Getting some info ==
=== Get width ===
getWidth() :: int;
{{{
$width = $image->getWidth();
}}}

=== Get height ===
getHeight() :: int;
{{{
$height = $image->getHeight();
}}}

== Saving ==
save( $filename ) :: bool;
 # $filename :: string.

{{{
$image->save( $filename );
}}}
